    • Method Detail

      • castVotingOnMotion

        void castVotingOnMotion(int voterId,
                        java.lang.Enum<VoteState> voteState,
                        boolean isVicePresident)
                 throws MaximumVoteOnMotionException,
                        MotionException,
                        DuplicateVoteException,
                        VicePresidentVoteException
        Cast voting on Motion, performs core voting on motions scenarios for the given Motion.
        Parameters:
        voterId - Corresponds to one Senator who votes on Motion.
        voteState - YES/NO Votes on Motion.
        isVicePresident - is the Voter Vice President.
        Throws:
        MaximumVoteOnMotionException - if maximum votes reaches 101.
        MotionException
        DuplicateVoteException - if the same Senator tries to vote for the second time on the same Motion.
        VicePresidentVoteException - if Vice President cast votes other than TIED state.

      • setMotionState

        void setMotionState()
        Sets Motion state to PASSED/FAILED/TIED . Number of Yes votes greater than No votes, Motion is PASSED. Number of Yes votes less than No votes, Motion is FAILED. Equal number of Yes and No votes, Motion is Tied.
        Throws:
        MotionException

      • closeVotingOnMotion

        void closeVotingOnMotion()
                  throws CloseVotingException,
                         MotionException
        Close Motion on voting once done. Validates when Motion can be CLOSED,changes the Motion Status and MotionClosedTime.
        Throws:
        CloseVotingException - if Motion is tried to CLOSE less then 15 minutes after it is opened.
        MotionException - if we try to close already CLOSED Motion.

      • getOpenedTime

        the openedTime
